intro: No matter if your app is a Legacy Project, a brand new build, or anything in between, we can jump in at any stage of a product's life cycle to diagnose problems, build new features or start from the ground up.

services.title: iOS Development
services.description: We have years of experience with both Swift and Objective-C, meaning we work on almost any iOS project, be it new or legacy.

cta_copy: From Development to Consultancy, technical architecture to implementation of best practices, for teams of 1 to 1000, Otaku has more than a decade of experience working in the mobile sector. Whatever you need to build or improve your offering, we can help.
